document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomic, distributional and biological study of the genus Agrilus (Coleoptera: Buprestidae). Part II

Remarks . Two separate specimens of
A. graminis
were examined from Russia (Primorye). They may indicate the introduction of the species to Russian Far East. These records need reconfirmation by additional findings. See also remarks at
A. angustulus
.
